## ThirdwebSDK.getModule() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getModule<TModuleType extends ModuleType = ModuleType>(address: string, moduleType?: TModuleType): Promise<ModuleForModuleType<TModuleType>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | the address of the module to instantiate |
|  moduleType | TModuleType | optional, the type of module to instantiate |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;ModuleForModuleType&lt;TModuleType&gt;&gt;

a promise that resolves with the module instance
